title: Ao La Xing: Jinji Sheng Dian
synopsis: The protagonist Donghuang Taiyi (voiced by Li Zhengxiang) is the guardian of the ancient temple. When the ancient temple was invaded, he was ordered to flee to Aura with the "Wuji". After being hit hard, he lost his memory and turned into a cute Abi, and was killed The pull star "Landing (voiced by Zhang Anqi)" took in, named "Tai Er". Tai Er (voiced by Zhang Qi) gradually adapted to the life of Aura and met some friends. They discovered the conspiracy of the dark forces and worked hard to protect Aura. In the process, Tai Er also began to restore his memory and shoulder the difficulties of recovering the temple. mission…… (translated from douban)
